name: vImage_ARGBToYpCbCrMatrix
desc: A 3 x 3 matrix for converting RGB to Y'CbCr.

items.name: init(R_Yp: Float, G_Yp: Float, B_Yp: Float, R_Cb: Float, G_Cb: Float, B_Cb_R_Cr: Float, G_Cr: Float, B_Cr: Float)
items.desc: Creates a 3 x 3 matrix for converting RGB to Y'CbCr.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a 3 x 3 zero matrix for converting RGB to Y'CbCr.

items.desc: The R_Yp value in the conversion matrix.

items.desc: The B_Cr value in the conversion matrix.
